name: Pum-King (MiniJam89)
description:
Pum-King was created for MiniJam 89

Play as the Pum-king  and venture through the dark dungeon, using your 4 unique tools to fend off hordes of Deadly slimes.

Sword - Slash at enemies close by  

Shield - hold enemies back

Boomerang - throw at enemies and catch on the return (be careful, this tool wont come back if it hits a wall)

Bow - Use your limited arrows wisely.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD - Move 

Aim - Mouse cursor 

Use tool 1 - LMB

Use tool 2 - RMB

Open Tool menu - P

(Change what tools you have assigned by Pressing LMB  on the desired tool, and again use LMB on the assigned tools to swap the assigned items from LMB to RMB)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits

Tech - Abhiroop Basak
Design, Ui & Art - James Smith @OhDamn_ItsJam

Main Menu Background Art - Megan Norman @cosyghost
